data.text: A super fun game to play during your free time and works with and without internet. Love the music, the new seasons, and the characters you can unlock for every new season. It keeps the game gripping and entertaining. However, it can get super irritating to update it every time you change seasons. Overall, it's great and I highly recommend it.

I love this game. It's an instant classic. The endless running, the new locales, the incredible visuals... My only criticisim is I wish there was a way to just play classic subway surfers with no world tour. Don't get me wrong, I love the World tour, it's just... I want a taste of nostalgia for once. Other than that, God tier.

Great game, the season events keep things fresh and exciting. However, it's annoying that players have to wait for each tier of season hunt rewards to unlock. What's the point of collecting tokens if you have to wait? It makes the entire process feel boring, and cheap. Let players have access to rewards as soon as they earn them so they can actually enjoy the accomplishment.

I love all the characters in the game and how challenging it get thru out the run. It's very entertaining üòÅ I just don't like how it can be slow sometimes. It sometimes doesn't let me watch the add to get my prise, even if I have full bars. And I have to get to x8 speed just to go to the next level on something...If this gets fixed,then it will probably be a 5.
data.replyText: Thanks for your time and review. How could we make our game a 5-star experience? You can seek help for any game-related issues you might face on our support site - feel free to write us there as well: reviews@sybogames.com Let's help you get a better experience!

data.text: I used to play subway surfer when it first came out, but this new Verizon is updated and it's amazing. The graphics 10/10, Characters 10/10, music 10/10. Overall everything about this game is good. Yeah it has ads but so you can get things, like power ups and such. And I believe you can play off line I haven't tried yet but for ads off line, you won't be able to do anything. But you can still play the game if you don't have wi-fi you just have limited stuff.

UPDATED: It is one of the best games in the Play Store. Plenty of ads with rewards, but they're optional. Refreshing. Celebrated its 10-year anniversary. Congratulations. UPDATE: There's a problem with the game freezing while playing the Lunchables video for challenge rewards. The freeze crashes the game, and wipes out the progress you've made in your challenge.

It's a fun thing to do with your hands while you're paying attention to something else. I used to listen to YouTube while playing, but the fact that there's constant video ads that interrupt the videos is irritating. I have to go into airplane mode and watch the video on a different device in order to get the experience that I want. The hourglass challenge is also stupid. It's entirely based on luck and where the hourglasses spawn. At least the no floor thing was somewhat skill.
data.replyText: We really appreciate your feedback. Can you tell us what we would need to do to get 5 stars from you? For any issues with the game or for additional feedback, check out our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We love hearing feedback and ideas from our players!

data.text: This is a great game for raid trips if you don't have Wi-Fi or service or if your really bored I really recommend it if you're looking for an offline game you can play anywhere at any time!!! There's not very many problems maybe like a lag or two but that just depends if you have Wi-Fi or service... And every few months they always change the category and I always look forward to seeing what new stuff they have!! :))

It's a great game full of childhood memories... but with all the events and online stuff that comes with it, I can't even play this offline. Without the internet, the game is extremely slow to load, and it often lags. It's really sad and kills the experience I once had with this amazing game. I would love for the game to be fixed. The events are awesome, but I would like to be able to once agian play offline without lag or outright getting kicked out of the game.
data.replyText: Thank you very much for rating the game and leaving a review. You didn't give it many stars, and we would like to earn more! If you have more feedback or encounter an issue with our game, please visit our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We would like to hear more from you!

data.text: This game is SO fun!! I love that there are hardly any ads in the game, and the amount of missions, achievements, and events that the game gives you really draws in an audience!! And the in app purchases are a really good price, in my opinion üëå keep up the amazing work!!!

Literally the best game known to mankind, this was my whole childhood. The ads aren't annoying, I personally love to listen to music and podcasts while playing, the events and challenges are unique and fun everything about this is great. I'm surprised people rate it low. My friends and family have all played and is using this app. It is such a recognizable game and I personally love it. It has given me something to focus on while listening to music or podcasts.

But I would like the jackpot to be a bit easier to get. Because it takes forever to just unlock that badge. And it would be fun if we had more things to get with coins. Overall, this is a very great game. It is fun seeing the different characters come in the shop where we can buy them with coins and it would help if event coins cared over for the next season shop.
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see only a few stars from you and would love to get 5 stars. Please contact us if you have additional feedback or any issues with the game: reviews@sybogames.com Thanks again for your review. We really appreciate it.

data.text: This Game is really good Amazing good. The music fits perfect well when your on the run, But not just all, when you bump into any obstacle, the guard shows up and he keeps chasing you and he did a weird annoying growl which is so funny.üòÄ I kept playing over and over again until I got really addicted to it. I even played it back at the few years. The gameplay looks great and game itself is funny and when you run so quick, this becomes satisfying. :)üòå. So it's, 5 star ratingüòÅ Thank you, SYB0:)

This game is very simple, yet so fun! It's a great game to play offline. I enjoy unlocking new characters to play as. It's a very entertaining game that can be casual, or competitive. You can roll, run, and duck as you climb the leader board, or just have fun with it! The seasons have changing themes from around the world too. 5 stars, would DEFINITELY recommend!!

Honestly really well made, and their is a drive to get more skins and boards, but the only problem is that they just added too many things over the years, making it confusing. But other than that, I think that Subway Surfers is an actual good game other than the minor negatives, of course. Overall, it is recommended for all ages, honestly.

I got back into the game recently, and have experienced one issue multiple times: if I watch an ad to regenerate and click on it at all - which takes me out of the ad and into a pop up browser - it breaks my game. Going back to the Subway Surfers tab will present me with a blank screen, and though the ad countdown is still in the corner, the X will never pop up when the ads over. In order to play the game, I have to exit out of the app entirely and load back in, which invalidates my entire run.
data.replyText: We really appreciate your feedback. Can you tell us what we would need to do to get 5 stars from you? For any issues with the game or for additional feedback, check out our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We love hearing feedback and ideas from our players!

data.text: I love subway surfers so much I play it all the time , and I love all the season changes, and I love the rewards,and the challenges too , but there's so much ads, and it takes so much to just get one character, like skye you have to run over 2 million to get her , and miss Maia, you need 100 keys to get her. But other than that it is really great I love it. It's actually my favorite game to play , so keep up the great work !

This game is wonderful, probably the first thing I've ever played, but there is a glitch. whenever I touch a special thing, it doesn't work! (boxes, letters, jetpack, etc) Please fix this. it's good otherwise! Keep up with the work! Edit: Thank you for changing this. This is a game I would recommend to people just starting with electronics and the people who have been here awhile!
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see only a few stars from you and would love to get 5 stars. Please contact us if you have additional feedback or any issues with the game: reviews@sybogames.com Thanks again for your review. We really appreciate it.

data.text: You used to be able to play and get at least some monthly skins and boards with the coins, but now they are all either real money or an exorbitant amount of the square tokens, keys, or challenges. I'm actually fine with the challenges when they don't lock the levels as a cheap way of making you come back each day. Also, my God, the ads are unrelenting. "Watch an ad to get something? Don't bother clicking no cause we're giving you an ad anyway. " Just sad to see it fall so far
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see a 1-star rating for our game and would love to get 5 stars. Please contact us if you have additional feedback or any issues with the game: reviews@sybogames.com Thanks again for your review. We really appreciate it.

data.text: Subway Surfers is an amazing game. I have loved to see it change over the years and love all of the new features that have been added. Although I gave the game overall a 5 star review, in Subway Surfers, my music does not work. I have checked that it is turned on, it is not muted, and the volume is turned all the way up on the game and on my phone. Please fix this or alert me how to. I always enjoy being able to experience the wonderful tunes. I would highly recommend to download this game.

Absolutely love this game, no comments or concerns. I love this game since it has no ads interfering with the gameplay so your free to play as long as you won't without watching 10 ads at a time, and The only times you have to pay is for token and ect. So It's not trying to make you buy something just to make it to a new level. This game is well thought and organized, absolutely one of the game that I will play till my grave.

Okay So it's a really fun game in my opinion but this new update has a lot of bugs that's why I'm giving it 1 star. You see there's alot trains invisible, obstacles, roofs, the ground are also invisible half of the time. I've never had this happen before until this update, and half of the time when I try to load the game it kicks me off, but I'm pretty sure that's just my phone. Anyway please fix all the bugs.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you rated our game at 1-star, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. Check our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com if you have any issues with the game or additional feedback. We'd love to help and learn more!

data.text: Can't get hover boards to load. No matter how many times I tap the screen, no matter which lane the runner is in. I might download the game again IF the issue gets fixed. Maybe. (Edit) After a few weeks and a couple exchanged emails in which the developer suggested my device is the issue. However the device malfunction Only occurs on this app. Don't waste your time downloading this worthless app. I wish I could give it a Zero star rating!
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you rated our game at 1-star, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. Check our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com if you have any issues with the game or additional feedback. We'd love to help and learn more!

data.text: This game just gave me a zero score after an over million-point run. Years of glitches, scores and data not being carried over and just disappointing and time-wasting. It's actually fun to play but the problems are too much. The 30 second Lunchables ad keeps crashing at 9 seconds and I can't get my rewards or progress that needs ads. Please fix this.
data.replyText: We appreciate you leaving our game a review, but we were hoping for a better rating than 1 star. Our FAQ might help if you have issues with the game, and you can also provide more feedback there: reviews@sybogames.com We're happy to help and eager to learn more!

data.text: Alright, this is too much. These constant events are just too much for me. I barely even remember what OG subway surfers looked like anymore. I'm not saying stop doing events, just maybe do them less often and have a way to switch back to regular Subway Surfers. Unless there has been a way this entire time, and I'm just stupid, which is more than entirely possible. The only other issue I have are these characters; these new ones look like robot alien hippies. The original characters look better.

It's great!! There's just a lot of "connection issues" even when my connection is fine. Happens with multiple phones too, so it's not me. It doesn't give me awards for ads I've watched (forcing me to watch another ad), can freeze on the option to waste keys or watch an ad for a revive (which forces to restart the game all the way), and just a lot of bugs/glitches. This game is amazing and a wonderful time waster... But it does suck to have a 2+ million run ruined due to "connection issues"
data.replyText: Thanks for your time and review. How could we make our game a 5-star experience? You can seek help for any game-related issues you might face on our support site - feel free to write us there as well: reviews@sybogames.com Let's help you get a better experience!

data.text: BUG REPORT Total points for obtaining listed characters and boards do not add up correctly. It falls short of required amount. It doesn't acknowledge completion. ------------------------ The game's Tech Support is great. They helped me get all of my hard earned characters back. I've been playing this game for years and accumulated many characters and boards, so having access to them again made me very happy :) This is one of my favorite go-to games when I want to destress and just veg.

data.userName: Like the Doo Dah Man Truckn On
data.text: I'm totally digging it, the controls, game boards, special abilities and rewards are all on point. You can really come up by watching adds but you aren't made to watch them. I just started playing but I haven't found anything that usually turns me away from games. I would add a spray painting graffiti board to the game if I was on the Dev team ;)

This game has improved tremendously since the first time I played it(2016)! Many fun new challenges and good graphics! Keeps you entertained. Love it! I'm also wondering what the point of collecting sneaks after completing quests is if you can't even use the sneaks to buy anything. Also, I wish it was easier to get more keys instead of having to buy them with real money, wish there was an option to spend like 20000 surfer coins to get like 10 keys for example.

This is an excellent time-killer. However, it requires a lot of side-grinding. Infact, this season's character and board are to be acquired as rewards in Quests, which is notoriously hard (timed). As a student, I can't dedicate so much time to grind. I understand that it's no fun if things are too easy, but getting Season Specials should be much easier. Otherwise, it's definitely my go-to game. Warning: it's addictive! <3
data.replyText: We really appreciate your feedback. Can you tell us what we would need to do to get 5 stars from you? For any issues with the game or for additional feedback, check out our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We love hearing feedback and ideas from our players!

data.text: Great game. I've been playing it for over 2 years now. Only problem is, I usually like to listen to my own music when playing Subway Surfers, and recent updates have made that more annoying on Android. When I open Subway Surfers while music is playing, the music is paused. Resuming it results in ALL Subway Surfers Sounds being MUTED, even though they don't show as such. It's like y'all forgot that the ingame music is easy to mute. Please fix this. It didn't used to do that. Other than that, üëçüëç

There are some problems with the game but overall good game I'd give it 5 stars but it is not perfect. Some things they really need to fix is the get a reward for playing every day I'm a student so I can't play it every day and I forget to do it when I get home so I either watch a ad or spend keys I know people would probably go for the ad so they can keep their keys to save up but I really hate ads so please make it like a week or something not a month it would help! Thank you sorry it's long.

One. Billion. Downloads. AND THIS GAME DESERVES THEM! I love this game. It's fun, easy to play, and it isn't pay to win! You can obviously pay for in game items, but it isn't necessary. You can pay in-game keys to continue in your run, or watch and ad, and I think that's amazing! I haven't had a single problem before! This game deserves ‚ôæÔ∏è/5!

I enjoy the game quite a bit but once you get good enough it's just a game of endurance, I would rather have a hard mode at some point where the points counter goes up faster because having a run for over an hour gets boring. Also I agree with other reviews about buying more characters with coins. Overall, it's a good game.

I enjoy the game it's really amazing but I do have a few qualms one being after a few times of being on the app it kinda just stops. Like it freezes at the loading page and no matter how long I wait it does not load in. So I have to reset the game all together for it to let me get back on. Another thing I'd even though I sign in none of my progress is ever saved

This game was a core childhood memory, so when I was trying to find a good offline road trip game and came across Subway Surfers, I couldn't help but buy it. Not only is it fun, there is so much you can do! Daily challenges for endless possibilities. I love, Love, LOVE this game to death. Especially for long car rides. My family goes on plenty of road trips and sometimes it gets boring. Subway Surfers IS THE ANSWER. Totally would recommend for any cenario.

Subway Surfer is an exhilarating mobile game that deserves every bit of its 5-star rating. The endless runner concept is brilliantly executed, providing a perfect balance of challenge and excitement. The vibrant and dynamic graphics create a visually appealing experience, while the diverse landscapes keep the gameplay fresh and engaging. With a wide array of characters and power-ups, Subway Surfer offers endless possibilities for customization and strategy.

I'm kind of leaving this as a rage review. great game overall, but when I was on my best run yet I had over 700,000 points I died. Me dying is fine but when I went to do the revive it gave me a add that doesn't work (it's Tik-Tok. Someone else who reviewed this described it) and whenever I get those ads it ends the run. I get those ads constantly. But pretty good game overall. (Edit the add went away and my new score wasn't counted I was going to leave four stars)
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you didn't give our game many stars, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. Check our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com if you have any issues with the game or additional feedback. We would love to help and learn more!

data.text: The game is great. But there is a problem that could possibly be from my phone. Every time I get a ad for Lego fortnite, (like to get rewards I missed or respawn after death) it glitches out after three seconds and kicks me out of the ad as the x pops up. It says there's a connection issue, but my wifi is perfectly fine and any other ad works fine. Also, Sometimes when I die, and click to use a key, i won't respawn but it takes my keys, so that REALLY annoys me. please fix key glitch.

Weird Music bug plays when playing the game, it just started recently. I always play the game with no sound or music and listen to something else in the background, however it plays its own music now, despite me having muted both sound and music in settings. It also continues to play when I exit the game, and only stops playing when I fully close the app, in that I clear it from the background. Weird bug.

The game is great! As always, the classic. The updates are cool too, the best thing is that there are continuous events, and I love it. Tho there's a big problem. The game always pauses for me when I watch ads to get rewards or revive. It pauses and exits itself. It happens so frequently, it's very annoying. Please fix this issue. 2,459 people found this helpful

This app SUCKS. You can be in the middle of a run and it will close and you'll loose all the progress. That will continue to happen. Not to mention they find ANY excuse for more adds, including doubling them and making any progress only valid if you watch adds. And to make matters worse, some of them will open a random page and guess what? YES, YOU LOOSE ALL THE PROGRESS. It gets worse by the second

It's a very fun game and it's VERY entertaining. There isn't any big problems in here except one: the game always freezes whenever I unlock something. For Example: I got a mystery box and then I try to open it but it just doesn't budge. Sometimes I even have to get off the app and join again, and sometimes even THAT doesn't work and I have to wait for two whole hours to get back into the game or reset my phone. The only reason I didn't give this game a 1 star is because it is entertaining.

This is the best game for real i have been playing this game for a while and got no problems at all The ads are really rare and you can get some rewards by watching the ads . One problem i would tell is that the game is getting more money based you have to buy most of the seasonal surfers with money ,but you still can get many by playing the game . I have no specific complaints with the game its satisfying to play and has different maps to play . You can play offline as well as online .

This game is very fun to play. However, the problem is the ads itself. I'm using a very fast internet connection just to watch ads that gave me keys. Yet your game said that I have internet problems. I really don't like that. There is one ads showed up however but the ad is also the problem. It says it has granted the reward but when I close it, it doesn't give me anything. Can you please fix all of this? I appreciate your work. I'm hoping the ad problem won't be a thing in the future.

data.text: very good endless runner game. there are a bunch of stuff that needs ads but if u watch 10 of them it will give you a box, mystery box and a super mystery box. lots of skins, this game is perfect for me. I absolutely recommend it to anyone. Edit: I'm actually pretty young, but still...I GOT A DIAMOND AWARD!!!edit 2 lol: I played the original soundtrack and felt soooooo nostalgic for subway city I would love it if after the st. Patrick event, the next location will be subway city. Great game!

I love the game it's interesting but recently have not been playing it cause it's kind of furstrating . Cause it's so annoying to lose your progress maybe from 100 coin to 0 how do you expect someone to feel...?NICE! Just create maybe a subway cloud or something you can link your game to and save your progress that all I have for you guys . Thanks ü§ù

This game is great. I love how it's very relaxing but sometimes Stressful. It gives you a nice challenge (when you want it). I can never get off this game I'm always trying to beat my original high score. One problem is that you always have to keep on updating every 2 weeks or so as there are updates every 2 weeks and it can get annoying maybe if you gave us have longer time it would be better. Otherwise this game is absolutely amazing and definitely reccomend it if your patient

I tried clones of this game‚Äîthis game is almost fair, and doesn't require tilting; the latter is an advantage. I also like the event. But: As of writing, I've encountered 4 times where there was no path clear of trains, or an obstacle in front of a train behind it. The sections are all the same, not even mirrored. Only 3 lanes, not 2 or 4. There's many annoyances/addictions. Can't exit without touching something in the game's UI (I'm using the gesture system navigation scheme, not 3-button).

data.text: I've seen some really beautiful zones ever since I started playing the game only to update the game and get a zone I totally do NOT like. I love what u did with the background music where players get to choose which background music is best for them. If u could do that with the zones, I would really like that because players can choose which zone they like best.

I like it so much and it is my childhood game. I play this game all the dayy and the new ubdate of taking pictures in the studio is amazing and backround song, but one thing i dont like is the character choices , like litterelly if i like a character i have to pay for it! And some of them are buyed by the blue keys but there are not enough keys to collect Otherwise it is a exellent game:)

I love subway surfers. I have been playing it for ages with a high score of 180,000. I like how if you get hit, you can watch a short ad to continue. I only rate it 4 stars because after a bit, there are no more ads and I can't afford to many keys. Also things can be very expensive. Overall, four stars üåü üåü üåü üåü

I like the game, but every few updates it stops supporting the "split screen" function and it's one of the only times I play it: while watching a YouTube video. I've been a loyal player for years, I watch a lot of ads, complete all the events religiously every day. But the split screen is a deal breaker, I've deleted the game over it before, and it had been fixed when I redownloaded. But not anymore. I dislike when there are avatars that you have to buy for buffs. I watch like 20 ads a day !

If you have more feedback or encounter an issue with our game, please visit our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We would like to hear more from you!

data.text: This game is very entertaining, which you can play it offline. Although you can play it offline, to unlock some features like the events, some rewards, and a lot more, it's a bit annoying when you have no internet connection and you want to participate in games. To summarize it all, this game is VERY GOOD despite the other disadvantages I've seen.

Subway Surfers is a blast of childhood memories and modern excitement rolled into one. The game's good humor, both in-game and on Instagram, adds a playful touch to the experience. Despite growing up, I still find the game engaging, especially with its constant updates like new maps, characters, and game modes. My favorite map is the underwater theme, and I wish it could stay forever. As for game modes, I love the challenge of no floor and mystery hurdles, keeping me hooked for hours on end.

Been a player since the the app was released but some of the ways ads are implemented is ruining the experience and my ability to enjoy the game. After the latest update I can't even buy Mystery boxes as I used to without watching ads. Imo it should be optional when it comes to extra rewards. Also having to watch ads to clear missions instead of having the option of paying with coins is not great, especially while offline. I've saved up coins, let me use them please.

I really don't know what's happening right now. I used to play subway surfers when it first came out it was amazing so I downloaded it again coz I missed it. When I downloaded it, the changes were so amazing, after some days It stopped loading when it reached 78%. I restarted the app nothing changed, restarted my phone nothing changed and even updated the app nothing changed. Please can u fix the problem, I really want to play
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see a 1-star rating for our game and would love to get 5 stars. Please contact us if you have additional feedback or any issues with the game: reviews@sybogames.com Thanks again for your review. We really appreciate it.

data.text: This game is literally the best! It is perfect for either somebody who want a quick 5 minute game or a game that you can play for hours! With regularly updated missions and seasons, Subway surfers makes it fun no matter when you're playing. In never foces you to pay for things and you can challenge people all over the world to get the no.1 spot! I cannot recommend this enough!

A really solid experience. I remember playing this almost everyday on my phone, deciding to revisit this game is probably one of my greatest decisions this month. The game is still fun, the grind isn't that boring. Events are interesting and really difficult to complete, a reasonable amount of ads and cosmetics actually look worth grinding for. Overall great game.

Earlier i used to get watch ads option and ads were playing successfully. But now, i don't know for what reason the ads have stopped playing. Watch ads option is there but ads won't load/play. I thought it was just a bug and will go away with the new update. But, even after updating the game today ads are not playing up. Please fix it up ASAP. I'm very annoyed.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you didn't give our game many stars, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. Check our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com if you have any issues with the game or additional feedback. We would love to help and learn more!

data.text: Wow! This game has improved a lot since I last played it! Love the new music! (Although, I think there's some kind of glitch with the Daily Challenge. It always seems to be stuck on Day 5+, no matter how many days in a row I've actually played. Also, it the Mystery Box price supposed to reset with each update?)

Never gets old.Its kinda like temple run in a good way. So lit I thought roblox,fortnite, and call of duty black ops 4 couldn't compare. Still a game you can play for hours. One problem. needs.more.skins. It still has the skins from the 1980's(exaggeration). I mean it's good to have old but like they say out with the old in with the new!

Best game If you wanna pass the time. The only problem with this game is that it has EA vibes. For example, ads every 2 minutes, you having to gamble to complete something, and spending real money just to get a new character. But overall, this is a really good game. Keep up the good work!

Subway Surfers captivates players with its fast-paced endless running and vibrant graphics, offering an addictive mobile gaming experience. The intuitive swipe controls make it accessible to all ages, enhancing its widespread appeal. The diverse and constantly evolving in-game environments keep the gameplay fresh, encouraging long-term engagement. However, its heavy reliance on in-app purchases can be a drawback, hindering the progression for those unwilling to spend real money. Btw best indeed.
data.replyText: Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. However, we're sad to see only a few stars from you and would love to get 5 stars. Please contact us if you have additional feedback or any issues with the game: reviews@sybogames.com Thanks again for your review. We really appreciate it.

data.text: That's a classic game I've been playing since my childhood. I still enjoy playing it. But there's a noticeable change that made me slowly lose interest in this game. The characters since 2020 look different but worse in design and colors. It would be way better with their first classic subway surfers design. Now they look too round like cringe nickelodeon 3d cartoons. The old characters had better coloring and shading. Plus, all the new characters have weird futuristic clothes that are ugly.
data.replyText: Thank you very much for rating the game and leaving a review. You didn't give it many stars, and we would like to earn more! If you have more feedback or encounter an issue with our game, please visit our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com We would like to hear more from you!

data.text: The game is good but, Sometimes the game doesn't work and force to be updated A moment before I just updated it but when I tried to play the game all the coins, score, keys and all the boosters, magnets üß≤ I have upgraded all are finished and all data is removedü§® I am totally disheartened bcz It was so hard to make that much score. that's why I'm going to uninstall it. Happy journey!!

data.text: Good But it's a little bit lagging are playing you can move the player and there are two expensive and the most big problem is this lagging a lot you can slide anywhere then you character will die and if you touch the key üóùÔ∏è it automatically take one of the key when your player die and we are playing Easter egg. And the good points are there are lot of events it doesn't use data but when you play in event you need to use data it's the problem by the way it's a good game you can timepass

classic game, simple and entertaining. but lately, EVERYTHING is just pay-to-win. any special/event surfer, boards etc. edit: the game would be a lot better if you could buy more stuff with coins/keys/event tokens instead of ONLY having the option of paying real money, since it's a simple game that not a lot of people play fanatically
data.replyText: Thanks for your feedback. What can we do to get 5 stars and not just a few stars from you? More feedback is always welcome. Contact us at reviews@sybogames.com You can also find help with any issue with the game you might have. Please let us know how we can improve!

data.text: Subway Surfers is an all-time classic, sitting on the top of the "running games" list. It is a super smooth, lag-free game, which allows you to move faster and more complex, unlocking its full potential. Moreover, there are lots of events that used to be non-existent in the past. However, obtaining one of its new-styled characters without purchasing them with real-world money is almost impossible. That being said, money (or ads) is often required, but that doesn't make it less enjoyable.
data.replyText: Thanks for the review. We would love to get a 5-star rating for our game from you. Our FAQ could help if you're having issues with our game. Feel free to contact us with more feedback as well at: https://sybo.zendesk.com/. Hope we can be of help.

data.text: They've ruined the game by putting an ad after every run. I don't mind watching ads to get things and used to watch 10 or more ads to get rewards. But sometimes I just want to run the courses. I don't want to have to sit through an ad to do it again. You've ruined the game that way. Good work!

1 star for ads that open a webpage that opens within the subway surfers app and cannot be closed without closing the app meaning the reward or progress in a run is lost. This has been a recurring issue for years. It's be great if they could stop using ads like this but I've already complained about it numerous times to no avail. Update: no I will not be checking the useless faq. Stop running ads that lock up the game. This review is here to stay.
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know! We were sad to see you rated our game at 1-star, as we aim to deliver you a 5-star experience. Check our FAQ or contact us at: reviews@sybogames.com if you have any issues with the game or additional feedback. We'd love to help and learn more!

data.text: The game is very good however ads are too long and you need them to collect things and carry on with the game. Sometimes powerups disappear. When pressing pause, it would be ideal to see all pending missions, daily challenges and achievements.

I absolutely love this game. You can play offline, and it is very entertaining game. It's basically an obstacle course, that you swipe your finger to jump, roll, move left and right. I recommend getting 'Subway Surfers'.

I absolutely love subway surfers. I spend HOURS on this game. My screen time for subway surfers just this week was 47h and 18min. And I see people complain about the glitches but honestly I don't mind them. The only time I got a glitch I didn't like was when I bought a hoverboard and it took double coins, but otherwise I kinda love the glitches. I spent 150 keys on a bundle offer recently, and them it glitched. When I came back the next day, I had 136 keys and everything from the bundle!! ‚ôæÔ∏è/10.

It is a very lovely and fun game for sure! The best part is today it is that you can try new events and day, any time. The review has to be speechless.I have been into it since I was 5 , probably since my childhood!!! It is very funny and hilarious to see how the weird characters dance and all of them are unique, have their own speciality and always carry a awesome prop with them. It is quite easy to earn around 20000 in a day if you just play for like 15-20 minutes. I hope you enjoy this game.

This game is very bad. I am sorry but not sorry because you have to check this game regularly, when I unlock Tasha it is became so slow and when I am sliding my finger to right it automatically do jump. You are responsible for this incident and you think only one time this incident happened than you are wrong because always this incident happened. And when I by mistakenly I deleted the game than it will come when I re-download it but with a upgrade, I only like Vegas in this subway surfers. ü§¨.

I keep losing my progress. The game keeps restarting my progress whenever I don't I play within a couple of hours. It's really unfair and annoying because of the time I've spent playing it. I thought this issue was fixed with the new update but I was wrong. You've officially ruined my childhood mobile game.
data.replyText: We really appreciate your feedback. Can you tell us what we would need to do to get 5 stars from you? We hope you visit our support site if you encounter issues with the game or want to provide more feedback: https://subwaysurfers.zendesk.com/. We would like to hear more from you!

data.text: I think the game is really fun but it doesn't really make sense, because the trains come out of nowhere. when I look at where the trains come from there's just a giant obstacle it's like the train goes through the obstacle. Above all else I think it is really really fun ‚ù§üôÉüëΩ

Yeah, there's lots of ads to watch, but there's always a prize at the end. No ad longer than 30 seconds. Some ads only 5 seconds. No redirects to other sites, unless you press the ad's redirect button.

The game is so much fun and also I have so much memory with it since I've play it for so long nowü§ç‚ú® it's doing great and no lag so I'm so happy but the only problem I experience until today is my account always gets lost even though it's connected to my Facebook and google:( please fix it:( I'm kinda sad because I always lose all my progress but im still rating it 5 star because it's beautiful:) thank you creators and more updates to comeü§ç‚ú®plsss fix this issue:(

Every updates of this game are awesome. Stylish looking characters and boards with awesome power and boost. But just wanna let you know that there are still some bugs or glitches on this game because I spend all of my 150 keys to buy new characters and logged out for a while and after i login to play i got all my 150 keys back and I still have my character.Hope you guys will fix this soon.

It's a really good game, and you can play it offline. All of my family have this game it makes.long car rides more quiet some times it can be a bit annoying because some challenges you can only play 1 or 2

It seems the new season of Ireland has corrected the cost of the mystery boxes and the ad limit has gone away. I am 70 years old and started playing this game when covid started. I am hooked on this game and I think playing a game that is wholesome and fair without hacking and cheating online is the best for people like me.
data.replyText: Your review of our game is important to us. What would it take to earn a 5-star rating from you? Please contact us if you need help with any game-related issues or if you have more feedback: reviews@sybogames.com Feedback from our players is super valuable to us.

data.text: This game is too good but we have to spend real money to buy characters and if we don't buy it than we will lose it forever and I try to update this game after the event is over but I couldn't it's so boring to play 20-30 days same event there will be no new characters and nothing else interesting so I request please fix this problem otherwise I will uninstall this game

The game is fun, but as a student, I can't dedicate hours to grinding for events. I think that events should come back so everyone gets a chance at getting old characters. Also, I have a phone and a tablet. I wish there was a way I could have one account linked to subway surfers, because I have so many more characters on my tablet than on my phone. It also means I have to grind 2x as much. I just wish there was a way for me to sync my email with the game so I could have 1 account on all devices

Subway Surfers is a great game that I play often. It's really fun not to mention the characters, story line and in-game elements. The thing I love most about it is that you can play it wherever and whenever you want to because you don't need wifi to play. Overall Subway Surfers is a great game to play.

Great game, super popular! But I'm not sure if this is my fault or theirs. I recently switched phones, and when i opened it, it had wiped EVERYTHING. My purchases, people I unlocked, everything. This is not to hate on the game, just annoying.
One of the classics. An absolute icon of mobile gaming history. Casual gaming hasn't gotten much finer. Subway Surfers is repetitive, but does it as well as it can. Would 100% recommend

This game is so realistic like bsfrn. The only thing that really pisses me off is the part when there is trains, subways, surf/skateboards, spray paint, people, guards, and obstacles. Other than that pretty good game tbh.
The experience is great except of a glitch ,like disappearance of power up and sometimes after playing the game it would delete itself overnight. Otherwise it's a very good game

A great game. Really this is fantastic. All of the different boards and skins you can buy. NO ADS. Except when you want to buy something watching an ad. This is one of the best games ever. Keep up the good work

Hi the game of my childhood. I've been playing since 2012, of course there were a lot of cool things in this game, but unfortunately there was a problem. After downloading the app from the play store, I log into the game. And everything seems to be going well, but after leaving it after a good time and coming back after a while, the percentage loading stops at 78%. And no matter how long you wait, nothing helps. All that remains is to delete the game and download it again and then every repeated

I am a huge fan of the game but the recent Update really upset me. I get waiting during an event to continue onto the next stage but this waiting-time is ridiculous. I've finsished stage 2 for the challenge to get "Lucky" and now I have to wait OVER 2 DAYS so that I can continue? Or use a good amount of keys which aren't that easy to come by when you're not buying them. I'll propably forget I was trying to unlock something before the cooldowns even up. Shame

Love the game but I casually waited till 2am for the update when it didn't pop up. I decided to uninstall and reinstall the game but the option to log in from Facebook or Google play wasn't there. It's currently 3am and I'm still trying to find my account. Does anyone mind helping.... Edit: the issue was fixed so 5 stars... It turned out that if you clicked too fast and put that you're under like 18 you can't log in :/ (this edit was made at 5am when the issue was resolved)

It's a good game but sometimes it can lag and kick me out of a game... For instance I was loading into one of those game modes... hurdle jump... And it js kicked me out and said that it was unable to connect even though my internet is fast and was connectedü§∑üëç Over all I definitely recommend!!!!

Been mostly free to play since since I've only bought the double coins and the +5 score multiplier. Finished a whole season pass in 3 days with help from ads. Good characters and new outfits make the grind more rewarding. Overall great experience so far even if I play a lot less than I used to.

This game is my favourite game ever . Most favourite is this game is available online and offline both . Obviously , sometimes it lags but no higer issues . Since I love to play this game at home , hotel , restaurant , train , etc . The graphics and colours are attractive and neat .

I have enjoyed playing this game through lots of it's season but with the previous update and this recent update: I'm unable to access 70% of the challenges even though I have full internet connectivity, yet it cites internet connectivity. I hope something can be done about it. Thank you

love this game and everything else, but i wish startups wouldn't go to waste when the app shuts down, not even asking for score and tokens to be added up. it's been a bit annoying during challenges since runs are still logged somehow since it restarts the cooldown countdown, but there could also be a good reason why this happens and i'd be curious to know D:
